title: Looking for Video Editor
body:
Hello,

I'm thinking about doing some sort of League gameplay/fun videos for possibly youtube, but personally i'm not really good when it comes to editing.
Looking for skilled video editor (someone experienced with making good quality montages)

Price - Negotiable

Add me on discord if you're interested - KRZv1 #9305
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: The video you want to make is related to LoL, but LoL skills aren't necessary to make it - video production skills are. Rather than posting somewhere with a focus on LoL and hoping to find someone willing to do video production work, I recommend posting somewhere with a focus on video production work to simply find a competent contractor, and they will be capable of producing a LoL video or any other type of video. Try Craigslist or freelancing sites.
